results.title: Atenolol vs enalapril in young hypertensive patients after successful repair of aortic coarctation.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ vs @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@ in young @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ after successful repair of @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Coarctation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001017 @@@aortic coarctation@@@.

citations.NLM: Di Salvo G, Castaldi B, Gala S, Baldini L, Del Gaizo F, D'Aiello FA, Mormile A, Rea A, Scognamiglio G, Pacileo G, Keating S, Fadel BM, Berrino L, Perna A, Russo MG, Calabrò R. Atenolol vs enalapril in young hypertensive patients after successful repair of aortic coarctation. J Hum Hypertens. 2016 Jun;30(6):363-7. PMID: 26290275

results.title: Anterior hypothalamic beta-adrenoceptors in chronic aortic-coarctated hypertensive rats: an interaction with central angiotensin II receptors.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@Atenolol@@@ (40 nmol) pretreatment partially and significantly prevented the pressor response to @GENE_AGT @GENE_24179 @@@AngII@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Aortic_Coarctation</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001017 @@@ACo@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@, but not in SO @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@. 3.

citations.NLM: Höcht C, Opezzo JA, Gironacci MM, Peña C, Taira CA. Anterior hypothalamic beta-adrenoceptors in chronic aortic-coarctated hypertensive rats: an interaction with central angiotensin II receptors. Clin Exp Pharmacol Physiol. 2005 Jan-Feb;32(1-2):30-4. PMID: 15730431
